revised_title: Development and Metamorphosis of Lepas fascicularis
tldr: The author studied the development and metamorphosis of the barnacle Lepas fascicularis. They discovered the life stages of the barnacle, from the Nauplius to the Cypris, and finally to the adult barnacle. The study provides insights into the barnacle's reproductive process and its role in the marine ecosystem.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
